input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Supervisor

Location: Rolla, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Summary

Immediate need for a Maintenance Supervisor to oversee an established team of automation maintenance professionals in the Ber Juan Park area of Missouri . Under the leadership of the Maintenance Manager, the successful candidate will work 3rd shift M-F, be responsible for leading a team of technicians ensuring that automation equipment is maintained efficiently, and kept in good working order.

The right person will have proven experience with the troubleshooting, repair and the PM of automated machinery & PLC's along with having excellent communication skills with the ability to lead in a positive manner.

Must have secondary electro-mechanical Engineering related education, 5+ years of proven supervisory experience within an automation environment along with 'preventive maintenance planning' experience to include EAM and CMMS.

This position requires availability to support a 24/7 operation, supporting an "on-call" urgent response during any unplanned downtime.

If this sounds like you and you are interested in joining a company that provides an 8% annual variable bonus, a great benefit package, education reimbursement & training opportunities then apply today!

location: ROLLA, Missouri

job type: Permanent

salary: $72,000 - 84,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 4pm

education: Bachelors

Responsibilities

Plan, coordinate, and supervise the day-to-day activities of the maintenance team and provide guidance for troubleshooting and planned downtime and emergency response activities; Provide oversight to ensure that plant equipment and maintenance systems function in an efficient & safe manner; Track and trend work order performance using CMMS and ensure the availability of parts and appropriate tools Administer preventative maintenance program to reduce automated equipment downtime and improve machine efficiencies; Leadership/Coaching of personnel through proactive communication, employee involvement, participation, and individual feedback; Maintains inventory of parts & supplies, to include PLC's for critical maintenance repairs; Ensures compliance with Health and Safety objectives while meeting maintenance performance targets.

Qualifications

Experience level: ManagerMinimum 6 years of experienceEducation: Bachelors

Skills

MaintenancePLCAutomationTroubleshootingElectro-mechanicalLeadership

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
